body_text:
I see. I had been swapping them out for easier use in the control directory, but you'd like it to point to the directories inside client.
I'll get to fixing this now.
body:
I see. I had been swapping them out for easier use in the `control` directory, but you'd like it to point to the directories inside `client`.

I'll get to fixing this now.
